item.title: Meetup - Tuesday 26th April 2016 at The ODI Node in Leeds
item.description: We're extremely pleased to be running our next Devops meetup as part of Leeds Digital Festival. To celebrate we will be meeting at The ODI Node in Leeds on Tuesday 26th April 2016 for an exciting evening of devops chat. Yet again we bring you a cracking line up: 6:45 - 7:15 : Grab a beer, have a natter. 7:15 - 7:30 : Group updates/news/announcements 7:30 - 8:00 : Simon Davy - Canonical
